product_name: Timex Ironman Move X20 Activity Monitor - Small
long_description: Sized for smaller wrists, this 24-hr. activity monitor uses an advanced 3D accelerometer to accurately track and display your steps, distance, calories burned, sleep patterns, time of day and date.
short_description: Sized for smaller wrists, this 24-hr. activity monitor uses an advanced 3D accelerometer to accurately track and display your steps, distance, calories burned, sleep patterns, time of day and date.
